data.text/markdown:
🤖 LangGraph Agent Demo

This demo showcases a LangGraph agent with planning, memory, and custom tools. Features:
  • 📧 Email reading tool
  • 📅 Calendar event creation tool
  • 🧠 Memory display tool
  • 🔧 Tools introspection
  • 💭 Decision tracking

data.text/markdown: Answers from the LLM

### 🤖 Agent Response:

    I have reviewed your last 10 emails. Here's a categorization based on their content:
  1. Receipts/Invoices:
    • From: Anthropic, PBC
    • Subject: Your receipt from Anthropic, PBC #2809-4640-2871
    • Details: Includes a receipt for a payment of $11.90.
  2. Account Security/Verification:
    • From: GitHub
    • Subject: [GitHub] A third-party OAuth application has been added to your account
    • Details: Notification about a third-party application authorized for your account.
    • From: Cline
    • Subject: Bestätigen
    • Details: Email verification request.
  3. Social/Community:
    • From: Quora Digest
    • Subject: Hat eine Dir bekannte Person schon einmal abrupt den Kontakt zu Dir abgebrochen?
    • Details: Digest with community questions.
    • From: Medium Daily Digest
    • Subject: This Tool Gained 30K GitHub Stars in One
    • Details: Highlights from Medium articles.
  4. Newsletters/Updates:
    • From: Was jetzt? von DIE ZEIT
    • Subject: Nur gute Nachrichten und Inspirierendes zum Wochenende
    • Details: Weekend newsletter with positive news.
    • From: Azul Fidelidade
    • Subject: Traga os seus pontos para o Azul Fidelidade 💙
    • Details: Newsletter about loyalty points and travel.
  5. Personal:
    • From: Alois Wirth
    • Subject: Abendessen
    • Details: Personal message about a dinner invitation.
  6. Subscription Management:
    • From: Atlassian
    • Subject: You’re now on Service Collection Free plan
    • Details: Notification about subscription changes.
Let me know if you need any further actions regarding these emails!
